name: Elemental Forge
description: A magical workshop harnesses the power of elemental forces to create powerful weapons and artifacts, with forges powered by fire, water, earth, and air. The elemental-powered creations can be extremely valuable and powerful, while the unstable elemental forces and dangerous magical processes create constant hazards.
atmosphere: Elemental forces rage around you - fire, water, earth, and air dance in controlled chaos. Air crackles with pure elements and ultimate power scent. Skin tingles with presence of raw elemental energy. Taste of creation and destruction fills mouth. Weight of unstable elemental forces and dangerous magical processes makes heart race with excitement and fear.
